channel.title: tech support on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in tech support on Vinod Kurup

item.title: USB-C lint
item.author: vinod@kurup.com (Vinod Kurup, MD)
item.description: The problem The USB-C cord kept falling out of my Android phone. It started happening in the car. A little bump while driving would make the cord fall out. Then it started happening even when I just had it plugged in on a table. I’d come down in the morning and the charge would be drained because it hadn’t been fully plugged in. Finally, I couldn’t even get it to charge unless I plugged it in forcefully, and put a book under the cord at a certain angle to keep it plugged in.
